6017.verse: يَقُولُ|He will say,|95|140|77$يَـٰلَيْتَنِى|`O! I wish|87|177|4181$قَدَّمْتُ|I had sent forth|125|215|16077$لِحَيَاتِى|for my life.`|99|144|18129$

6034.verse: فَلَا|But not|69|155|208$ٱقْتَحَمَ|he has attempted|138|310|18153$ٱلْعَقَبَةَ|the steep path.|124|210|18154$

6035.verse: وَمَآ|And what|83|124|46$أَدْرَٮٰكَ|can make you know|151|233|17213$مَا|what|53|135|262$ٱلْعَقَبَةُ|the steep path is?|141|182|18155$

6040.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|64|293$كَانَ|he is|57|78|913$مِنَ|of|50|71|156$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|110|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|103|84$وَتَوَاصَوْاْ|and enjoin each other|165|186|18162$بِٱلصَّبْرِ|to patience,|101|112|455$وَتَوَاصَوْاْ|and enjoin each other|165|360|18162$بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ|to compassion.|120|315|18163$

6042.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|But those who|116|141|42$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|134|59$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِنَا|in Our Verses,|113|163|408$هُمْ|they|50|100|49$أَصْحَـٰبُ|(are the) companions|162|187|409$ٱلْمَشْــَٔمَةِ|(of) the left hand.|141|141|16519$

6043.verse: عَلَيْهِمْ|Over them,|94|184|22$نَارٌ|(will be the) Fire|129|308|2413$مُّؤْصَدَةُۢ|closed in.|94|184|18164$

6043.verse: Ealayohimo⚓Over them,⚓P|LEM:EalaY`★naArN⚓(will be the) Fire⚓ N|LEM:naAr|ROOT:nwr|F|INDEF|NOM★m~u&oSadapN[⚓closed in.⚓ ADJ|LEM:m~u&oSadap|ROOT:wSd|F|INDEF|NOM★

6017.verse: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

6018.verse: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

6019.verse: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

6020.verse: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

6021.verse: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

6024.verse: I swear by this city, Makkah -

6025.verse: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

6026.verse: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

6027.verse: We have certainly created man into hardship.

6028.verse: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

6029.verse: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

6030.verse: Does he think that no one has seen him?

6031.verse: Have We not made for him two eyes?

6032.verse: And a tongue and two lips?

6033.verse: And have shown him the two ways?

6034.verse: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

6035.verse: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

6036.verse: It is the freeing of a slave

6037.verse: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

6039.verse: Or a needy person in misery

6040.verse: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

6041.verse: Those are the companions of the right.

6042.verse: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

6043.verse: Over them will be fire closed in.
